info.description: API service to create and manage DIDs and credentials on cheqd network.

DidDocument.description: This input field contains either a complete DID document, or an incremental change (diff) to a DID document. See https://identity.foundation/did-registration/#diddocument.

CredentialRequest.description: Input fields for the create operation.

issuerDid.description: This input field is the Issuer's DID

subjectDid.description: This input field is the holder's DID

Credential.description: Input fields for the update operation.

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

CreateResourceRequest.description: Input fields for the resource creation
